message.body: Hi, the heater will be changed next wednesday at 8:30 am
Also, we got all the bills for september. Since idk when u r coming, can i pay them all this time and let u know how much u owe me?
Ill stop in the after noon to pay the gas, ill pay you for the electric

Well thete is internet and some other expense.. I made a list on the cork board. I have the check ready for vt gas with a stamp and all. Ill leave everthing on cork board u can replace vt gas check n re/calculate the math then
Alright, you can send it, ill come by and write you the check
Cool! I was on a roll last night so i just got everything ready. Lets figure out how to divvy up for oct :)
Also, would u and ria be interested in splitting a winter csa share? Ill fwd u an email fron full moon
Yea, We were interested in getting one anyway
